Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory359.png'}
{3: 'What can I do now?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '(Well... I need to keep treating the wounded.)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'What else can I do?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '(There are people who get injured every single day and supplies are scarce... If the source of the catastrophe is removed, all the problems will be solved, right?)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'On her way back to Conservation Area 046, Liv is reminded of the Omega Prototype.'}
{3: "She hadn't paid much attention to it during the test because of the hasty procedure, but in retrospect, the power of the weapon is the key to saving the world."}
{3: 'If we could test it again with adequate preparation, we would surely achieve better results, right?'}
{3: '...But a weapon test is dangerous and may hurt people.'}
{3: 'With Cosette in her arms, Liv is hesitating for quite a while before she finally asks Lucia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia, do you remember the Omega Prototype we tested before?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, I was thinking about that too. I remember it could absorb the Punishing Virus, something that had never happened before.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv tells Lucia what she thinks.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Apply for the testing program again?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She thinks about it for a moment.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Good idea. The previous test was too hasty. If we're better prepared this time, we'll definitely get better results.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Once we eliminate the Punishing Virus, we'll solve many other problems too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yes, I remember the look on Lee's face when he saw the test data. I'm sure he wants to try again too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Our top priority now is to find a way out of the predicament. We've got to be more proactive.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'That makes two of us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Can I apply for it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are you sure?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv rarely offers to do that, but Lucia smiles and is not surprised at all.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You can't wait to get it done, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes... Waiting and mourning can't change anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I've been thinking... Liv, you're really a strong girl. Unlike those who keep to themselves, you care about what you and other people feel.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Even if it's overwhelming for you sometimes, you can get over it and pull yourself together very soon.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Go and do what you want to do. Lee and I will give you our full support and when your application is approved, the three of us will go for the test together.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This new weapon will definitely play an important role in reclaiming Earth, and if we can find a solution, we'll help everybody out of this misery.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory457.jpg'}
{3: 'In Conservation Area 046, Liv tends to all the patients in need of treatment as usual.'}
{3: 'Since the leader of the armed refugees was informed of the story of Cosette, she stops complaining about Matches.'}
{3: 'When all her patients get their treatment, Liv takes Cosette, who is in a swaddle, to the cubicle of Commandant 【kuroname】.'}
{1: '1', 3: "She changes Cosette's nappy and feeds her some nutritional powder until the baby falls asleep. Then Liv puts Cosette in the makeshift cradle next to the commandant's bed."}
{3: 'She gets up and carefully checks the commandant while pressing the comms button.'}
{3: 'She thinks it will take a while before somebody answers, but she hears a familiar voice immediately.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Celica, there's something I want to ask you... Is there a follow-up test of that weapon we tested earlier?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "...What's the plan?", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I want to apply for further tests.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'What happened? You look... so much more determined than before.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Nothing happened. I just want to do what I can to get us out of the predicament.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Liv... If, I mean, if...', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'If there was a mission that would get us out of the predicament but would most likely pay the highest price, would you do it?', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The highest price? If you mean the safety of Lucia, Lee, and Commandant, I certainly wouldn't do it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "No, no, it's about your own safety.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "That's right.", 4: '11'}
{3: 'Although Celica keeps emphasizing the "if," she doesn\'t look like it is just a hypothesis.'}
{3: 'Liv used to feel powerless.'}
{3: "Sadness and regret can't change anything, so she decides to move on no matter what."}
{3: 'But at the same time, she is also aware of the fact that as long as the Punishing Virus is still around, the problems will drag on.'}
{3: 'What if the Punishing Virus is gone?'}
{3: "The Omega Weapon can make that happen. That's what everybody has been waiting for. Liv knows she can't let this opportunity slip away."}
{3: 'What if she has to die to make it happen?'}
{3: 'Liv remains silent for a moment, but eventually, she smiles in the face of this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'If it really worked, I would do it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Seriously? You really think so?', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'So many people died right in front of me and I could do nothing to help.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Now everybody, the Task Force and humans, are trapped in this catastrophe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'And no one will be spared, including the elite squads.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If it's just a matter of time before the catastrophe kills us all, why not do something that promises to make a difference? I'd love to give it a go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Celica... I don't want to see anyone die anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Actually... about this, the President hasn't decided whether to give you the call or not.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...Are you alone now?', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'There are only Commandant, me, and this little baby here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "A baby? Uh... Is it a refugee's child? Is the mother... dead?", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '【kuroname】 is still in a coma?', 4: '11'}
{3: "The signal is off for a moment before Celica's face reappears on the terminal."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "I'll transfer you to the Parliament Hall. Please keep your environment quiet.", 4: '11'}
{3: "Noticing the seriousness in Celica's expression, Liv turns back to make sure Cosette is sleeping before nodding to Celica."}
{3: "Celica's face blurs on the dark blue screen."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory427.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'BPN-08 Liv, Gray Raven, Task Force.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'On behalf of the Babylonia Parliament, I send an invitation to you.'}
{3: 'The cold, mechanical female voice echoes in the darkness. It is uttered by nobody, yet it can be anybody.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'In the war against the Punishing Virus, humans have never won a true victory.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'According to the calculation of Gestalt, no one will survive this catastrophe if effective measures are not taken.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'At the outbreak of the catastrophe in the Pulia Forest Park Ruins, the Science Council had already made a preliminary recreation of the technology recorded in the Omega File.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'We managed to retrieve and analyze the test data of the Omega Prototype through the contact of the Gray Raven with the Unidentified Twins.'}
{2: '???', 3: "The weapon's effectiveness in absorbing the Punishing Virus has been confirmed, and with its help, the infected mechanoids and Constructs can recover too."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Even the Corrupted...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Due to technical constraints, it's not yet possible to achieve all the research objectives at this stage."}
{2: '???', 3: 'BPN-08, we need you to support this technology and put the Omega Weapon into use as soon as possible.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What do you want me to do?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Become a carrier for the Omega Weapon.'}

{2: '???', 3: 'Use the latest specialized frame and its properties to "attract"" the Punishing Virus, allowing the virus to pass through your M.I.N.D. and be completely ""absorbed" by the Omega Weapon.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Through my M.I.N.D.?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "That's the only way to maximize the effect of the Omega Weapon."}

{2: '???', 3: "This is a dangerous task, because we can't control the rate of attraction of the virus, and once it exceeds the rate of absorption by the Omega Weapon, you'll get infected completely."}
{2: '???', 3: "In addition to that, there is also a high risk that your frame won't be able to reboot again or use recall due to symptoms such as M.I.N.D. deviation and contamination."}
{2: '???', 3: 'But in order to reclaim Earth and go back to our common home, we must do whatever it takes to overcome the predicament.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'BPN-08, humanity needs you.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Will the Punishing Virus really be cleared and infected individuals recovered?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'This will be our first attempt at this technology. At this stage, there remains a lot of uncertainties.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'BPN-08, we need a pioneer.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Fine, someone has to take the first step.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'BPN-08, does that mean you agree to our invitation?'}
{2: '???', 3: "Please confirm that you can't quit the mission once you take it."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Please confirm that you are aware of the dangers of this mission.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'At the end of the experiment, your chance of survival is only 7.23%.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'BPN-08, on behalf of the Babylonia Parliament and humanity, I thank you for your service.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Please tell me what to do next.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The hall is solemn and silent. A middle-aged man with an erect posture gets up and stands in front of a table.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Take Commandant 【kuroname】 back to Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "After this talk, I'll send out a notice to all Constructs stranded on the ground to explain the situation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "After I get their consent, you'll be escorted back by them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "There is an undestroyed underground base in City 047, where some transports and an airship are stored, along with the last of our supplies. They're all we've got now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'll let you open the base.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "We'll talk about what to do next when you return safely.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hold on. I have one more request.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Please let me... take a baby with me.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{3: 'While Liv is speaking to Babylonia...'}
{3: 'The Constructs that had been transferred from City 043 are talking to the Constructs that had survived the Omega Prototype delivery mission.'}
{3: 'Seeing Lucia and Lee walk into the lounge, one of the Constructs jumps up from his chair.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reyna', 3: 'So you guys finished your work now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'To her surprise, Lucia sees a familiar face from the initial annihilation of the Hetero-Hive Mother among the four surviving Constructs.'}
{2: 'Reyna', 3: "When we got out of the transport, we didn't even have time to say hi to Captain Lucia and the other members of Gray Raven.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Captain Percy', 3: "Exactly. Hello, I'm Percy. I met with Lucia and Captain Chrome in City 075 before.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...I've heard Lucia mention you guys.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You must be Captain Percy. You gave the locator to Commandant, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Captain Percy', 3: "That's right.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How are your injuries?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Captain Percy', 3: "We're all fine. My people are now taking a break inside the cabin. Want to check on them?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not now. Let them take a good rest. Why did you come down in the first place?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Captain Percy', 3: 'We volunteered. Too many people have died. The strong have important work to do, and the rest have their own concerns. At least we volunteers are not forced to come here.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reyna', 3: 'Besides, Captain said we were blessed to have survived the accident last time. So we need to make good use of our luck, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Captain Percy', 3: '...Reyna.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reyna', 3: "It's the truth. We survived again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reyna', 3: "I'll tell you a little secret. Captain is the only one who has survived all those missions, so he...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Captain Percy', 3: 'Hey!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Well, strong people usually have problems like that.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reyna', 3: "Come on. I've got your back here!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Reyna lets out a loud laugh while patting Percy's back."}
{3: 'His cheerful laugh is so reassuring and relaxing for these weary and battle-hardened fighters.'}
{3: 'During this brief respite, the terminals of all the Constructs start to beep...'}
{3: 'As Liv leaves the dimly-lit cubicle, she notices that all the Constructs are watching their terminals.'}
{3: 'The familiar voice of the President comes from the screen, wrapping up his short speech.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I had no idea that Omega Weapon could be incorporated into a frame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But such a specialized frame would be a serious burden on one's M.I.N.D., just like Chrome's Glory.", 4: '3'}
{3: "There is no misinformation in the Parliament's announcement. They just told Liv, and only Liv, the worst-case scenario."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, did you see the message? President Hassen said they wanted you to use the new specialized frame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Well... Actually, they told me they had the plan because I volunteered to do the test.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "President Hassen is very concerned about the commandant's condition... He would like to take the commandant to Babylonia for thorough treatment.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "As long as I can go back, I'll take the commandant with me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...I see. The commandant does need to go back to Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's just that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, are you sure you can do it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Specialized frames are nothing new to us, but with the commandant still in a coma, I'm a bit worried about you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia looks terribly worried, which makes Liv a bit anxious too.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But we finally have a chance to reverse the catastrophe.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv tries not to show too much affection. If Lucia and Lee knew the consequences of this mission, they would have done all they could to stop her.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It really bothers me. I need to go with you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia looks at Lee, who nods without saying a word.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Alright, the four of us go together then.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reyna', 3: "Great, Captain! We're going back!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Captain Percy', 3: 'This is a voluntary escort mission, not a return mission. We may die on the way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reyna', 3: "I'm aware of that. But I'm sure we'll make it!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sandra', 3: "I want to be an escort too, even though we're very likely to be killed. Still, this is the only way to return to Babylonia.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Sandra', 3: 'Besides, without Liv, I would have been killed already.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: 'That goes for me too. Everybody in this room is alive thanks to Liv.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "Alright then, who's going too?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Everyone in the room raises their hands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sandra', 3: "You don't have to thank us. I...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sandra is interrupted by a beep from her terminal.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory324.png', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl Construct', 3: 'Sandra!', 4: '13'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teen Construct', 3: 'Are you still with the Gray Raven?', 4: '13'}
{3: "Both of them are Sandra's teammates and are in charge of different areas during the mission. They have been keeping in touch through comms."}
{2: 'Teen Construct', 3: "How's it going? All seven of us are going to check over there. How many of you are leaving?", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Sandra', 3: "We're all going too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl Construct', 3: 'Looks like there are going to be a lot of people...', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Sandra', 3: 'Why are you all joining the mission?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teen Construct', 3: "It's not really about the mission.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Teen Construct', 3: 'Do you know that the underground base in City 047 was left behind by Kurono, and there remains a lot of supplies as well as transports?', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Teen Construct', 3: "I don't know why they suddenly figured it out and decided to give the Parliament permission.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Teen Construct', 3: "The Parliament now wants to use the supplies in that base for disaster relief. That's why so many people are going to City 047.", 4: '13'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl Construct', 3: "And we can take this opportunity to go back to Babylonia. It's now or never.", 4: '13'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teen Construct', 3: "I agree. Since you're going too, we'll meet up in the underground base in City 047, alright?", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Sandra', 3: 'Yes, see you there.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She cuts off the call.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hold on, guys. I really appreciate it, but we promised the people here to protect them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'If we all leave, who is going to take care of them?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: "I see your point, but the Hetero-Creature barrage is coming. I can't do detection, and I'm no match for those creatures.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Sandra', 3: "I still have the manual on taking care of the wounded you wrote for me, so I can work as a nurse here. But if anything dangerous is attacking this place, I won't be able to help.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 3', 3: "That's right. So, what should we do now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Shall we... stay?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia double-checks the action plan: If she wants to protect everybody, the best option is for her and Lee to stay.'}
{3: 'But a strange feeling comes to her mind, as if she has neglected something very important. Lucia frowns.'}
{3: 'The last time she felt that way was when she was on her way to capture the Ascendant by order of Ravenge. Is this just a coincidence?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia, what's wrong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...I have a bad feeling about this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '(Does overworrying mean mistrust...)', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv calls Lucia in a pleading tone. Lucia relents.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Sorry, I was overreacting. Alright, let's make a plan.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The President said there were plenty of supplies in the base, so I'm sure everybody wants to get their hands on them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're pretty close to the underground base and we have plenty of time to do round trips. So I suggest we take everyone there in different groups.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Okay, sounds good.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reyna', 3: 'The underground base is going to be bustling.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I know. Supplies are scarce these days. People will be flocking there.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sandra', 3: "I'll talk to their leader about the base.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: "Okay, it's not going to be a dangerous trip, but we need escorts, just to be on the safe side. I'll stay for now. Two vehicles can't hold everybody, so I guess we'll have to make a few more trips.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sandra', 3: "I'll stay here with you, Ray.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's hit the road.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory424.jpg'}
{3: 'Gray Raven arrives at the entrance to the underground base of City 047 at midday.'}
{3: 'After leaving the commandant in the sleeping pod, they are waiting for a while before a large influx of people comes from different directions.'}
{3: "Liv opens the base's warehouse and hands out the supplies inside to the eager crowds."}
{3: 'Days of hunger are finally quelled, for the time being. Everybody seems to be in a better mood.'}
{3: 'In the evening, even the refugees who had been relocated to City 044 arrive in their cars. After an exchange of pleasantries, they go back with supplies.'}
{3: 'Somebody shows up as the moon rises.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory362.png'}
{3: "He talks to the Gray Raven and learns that the wounded in Conservation Area 045 are being treated by Forsaken's doctor and everything is fine."}
{3: 'In order not to deplete the supplies there, Shrek has decided to get some supplies from the underground base in City 047.'}
{3: "As he hangs around, Matches the border collie spots him and follows his motorbike to Forsaken's base."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory424.jpg'}
{3: 'As dawn breaks, it is time to embark on the journey.'}
{3: 'The Constructs from different squads get together in groups as ordered by the interim captain for a final confirmation and roll call in front of the airship.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Captain Olke', 3: "I'm sure you all know from the President's message that the battle on our way back to Babylonia will be a tough one. This is a voluntary mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Olke', 3: "I don't care why you risk your lives to be part of it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Olke', 3: 'I just want you to understand one thing: Getting rid of the Punishing Virus is the only way out for humanity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Olke', 3: 'This is a difficult as well as noble battle. This is a life-changing moment for us all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Olke', 3: 'So we must win.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Olke', 3: 'There is half an hour to go before our departure. Say goodbye to your friends and get ready for the journey ahead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Captain Olke', 3: "And then, we'll win back the future of humanity and Earth!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I haven't seen that look on your face for a long time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Huh? You think I have a poker face?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's not what I meant... But you always looked like you were forcing yourself to smile, and while your facial expressions looked natural, your shoulders were always tense.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Maybe it's because it's a relief to finally see some hope.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Matches, Stanley, Fantine, Cosette... Whether they're people, animals... or Constructs...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I hope they are all safe and sound.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '"Just because you\'re weak doesn\'t mean you\'re useless?"', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Eh? Is that... what Commandant said?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's right.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I remember the second half of the sentence was..."Take a few parts out of you if you don\'t understand that," right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Remembering the past, they start to laugh.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, I had just joined Gray Raven at the time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "There was a very confident Construct, who snapped at a teammate, another Support Construct who couldn't kill the enemy as quickly as he did on a mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Most people couldn't be bothered with things like that, and none of the other commandants stepped in.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yes, I still remember the commandant said "Just because a single cog can\'t stand up to the enemy doesn\'t mean it should be left behind." I totally agree.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Whether it\'s a human or an animal, or even an insect or a bacterium, just because they seem "weak" doesn\'t mean they should be dismissed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'They are all unique and irreplaceable in their own positions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's the diversity of lives on Earth that gives us hope.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "That's why I'm so delighted to be involved in this research and hope it will make a difference.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia... You'll need to take care of the people here after I leave. But remember, you and Lee must take care of yourselves first.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv's smile is gone and she speaks very slowly."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I will. I promise you.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv nods and turns to look at the stairs before her. Those who are going with her are waiting there.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Captain Percy', 3: "Let's hit the road, Liv.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sandra', 3: 'Are you ready?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Have a safe trip.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv boards the airship with Cosette and Commandant 【kuroname】.'}
{3: 'This seemingly long journey is only the beginning of hope and parting for both Liv and the other surviving humans.'}
{3: 'No matter how much she wants to stay, she has to go.'}
